alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Logan; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:28PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wallace County in west central Kansas, Cheyenne and Thomas Counties in northwestern Kansas, Logan County in west central Kansas, Rawlins and Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas through 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/... At 927 PM MDT/1027 PM CDT/, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Benkelman to 4 miles southwest of Brewster to 7 miles east of Wallace. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet. 45-50 mph wind gusts were observed at the St. Francis and Goodland airports. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brewster around 1030 PM CDT. Levant around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Russell Springs. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 1 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne; Logan; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace
